text:
(1) and (2). 2559 Marion Avenue, west side, between E. Fordham Road and E. 193rd Street. A 7-story apartment house replaced this frame dwelling in 1938. The two views were taken the same day.

May 24, 1936

P.L.Sperr

(1) and (2). 2559 Marion Avenue, west side, between E. Fordham Road and E. 193rd Street. A 7-story apartment house replaced this frame dwelling in 1938. The two views were taken the same day.

May 24, 1936

P.L.Sperr

2550 and 2552 Marion Avenue, east side, north of Fordham Road, showing the two frame dwellings after they were damaged by fire.

May 11, 1938.

P. L. Sperr
title: Bronx: Marion Avenue.

text:
2559 and 2561-69 Marion Avenue, west side, between E. Fordham Road and E. 193rd Street, adjoining the Fordham branch of the New York Public Library. The new building, No. 2559, occupies the site of an old frame dwelling. The view is north.

June 16, 1938

P. L. Sperr
